title: Reese 21536 Drawbar 2 Inch Square and Ballmount Towing 2 Inch Starter Kit, Black
description: The Reese Towpower 2.5 Ton Steel Cable Puller is designed for pulling and tightening. This all steel construction cable puller features 2 drop forged steel hooks with spring action safety latches, non-slip rubber handle and easy thumb control lever release. With a pulling capacity of 5,000 pounds, it is ideal for moving heavy equipment and objects or removing tree stumps and debris. REESE is the market leader in automotive and recreational product solutions, engineered and designed to meet the demands for work and active lifestyles. REESE Towpower pioneered the technology that has set the standard for today's most advanced towing systems. We cater to the towing needs of everyone from recreation enthusiasts to heavy-duty agriculture users by manufacturing the largest selection of receiver hitches; ball mounts and hitch balls; trailer and hitch locks; couplers, jacks and winches; and electrical and lighting components that meet and exceed industry standards.
